p: According to the results of docking ( Table S1) obtained from AutoDock Vina, four potential SARS-CoV-2 inhibitors ( BVM, betulinic acid, and compounds 4 and 6) were selected based on a lower negative dock energy value. Detailed interactions between ligands and selected SARS-CoV-2 proteins are included in Supplementary Materials (Figures S3–S6 and Tables S2 and S3). MD simulation has been performed for compounds possessing the lowest score for binding energy ( BVM, betulinic acid, and compounds 4 and 6). Low fluctuations of RMSD of all proteins indicate that they reached stable conformation ( Supplementary Materials Figures S7–S9).
